title: Samsung Galaxy S20 and S20 Ultra hands-on
description: Samsung announced its latest flagship phones, the Galaxy S20, Galaxy S20 Plus, and Galaxy S20 Ultra. The camera system is the big, new thing, plus a 120Hz screen. Dieter Bohn goes hands-on with the new phones, their wild zoom lenses, and more. Theyll be available March 6th with prices ranging from $999.99 to $1,599.99, and with preorders beginning February 21st.    Read more about the Galaxy S20:   For more on Dieter Bohn's daily newsletter:   The biggest announcements from Samsungs Galaxy S20 event:  Galaxy Z Flip hands-on:   Subscribe:  Like The Verge on Facebook:  Follow on Twitter:  Follow on Instagram:   Why'd You Push That Button Podcast:  The Vergecast Podcast:  More about our podcasts:   Read More:  Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:   Subscribe to Verge Science on YouTube, a new home base for our explorations into the future of science:
